dcterms:creator: Andreas Geiger
Philip Lenz
Christoph Stiller
Raquel Urtasun
dcterms:description: The KITTI dataset consists of calibrated RGB images with synchronized point clouds from Velodyne lidar, inertial, and GPS information, and from more than 61 driving scenes. It contains approximately 80K raw image frames and associated sparse depth maps.
dcterms:title: KITTI

dcterms:creator: Adrien Gaidon
Qiao Wang
Yohann Cabon
Eleonora Vig
dcterms:description: Virtual KITTI contains approximately 17K images from 35 synthetic videos created by applying variations in weather, lighting, or camera angle to cloned KITTI videos. It includes dense depth maps and simulates KITTI's lidar-generated sparse depth measurements.
dcterms:title: Virtual KITTI

dcterms:creator: Holger Caesar
Varun Bankiti
Alex H Lang
Sourabh Vora
Venice Erin Liong
Qiang Xu
Anush Krishnan
Yu Pan
Giancarlo Baldan
Oscar Beijbom
dcterms:description: nuScenes is a multi-modal dataset for autonomous driving, consisting of calibrated RGB images and synchronized sparse point clouds. It includes 27.4K images from 1000 outdoor driving scenes for training and 5.8K images from 150 scenes for testing.
dcterms:title: nuScenes

dcterms:creator: Alex Wong
Xiaohan Fei
Stephanie Tsuei
Stefano Soatto
dcterms:description: VOID contains synchronized RGB images and sparse depth maps from indoor and outdoor scenes. It is designed for depth completion tasks and includes challenging sequences captured with a rolling shutter.
dcterms:title: VOID

dcterms:creator: Nathan Silberman
Derek Hoiem
Pushmeet Kohli
Rob Fergus
dcterms:description: NYUv2 contains synchronized RGB images and depth maps from indoor scenes, providing a rich dataset for depth completion tasks. It includes a diverse set of scenes from households, offices, and commercial types.
dcterms:title: NYUv2

dcterms:creator: John McCormac
Ankur Handa
Stefan Leutenegger
Andrew J Davison
dcterms:description: SceneNet RGB-D provides photorealistic images of synthetic indoor trajectories with ground truth depth maps. It is designed for depth completion tasks and includes a large number of images.
dcterms:title: SceneNet

dcterms:creator: Angela Dai
Angel X Chang
Manolis Savva
Maciej Halber
Thomas Funkhouser
Matthias Nie√üner
dcterms:description: ScanNet is a richly-annotated dataset of 3D reconstructions of indoor scenes, providing dense depth maps for depth completion tasks. It includes a large number of images and annotations.
dcterms:title: ScanNet

dcterms:creator: Pei Sun
Henrik Kretzschmar
Xerxes Dotiwalla
Aurelien Chouard
Vijaysai Patnaik
Paul Tsui
James Guo
Yin Zhou
Yuning Chai
Benjamin Caine
dcterms:description: The Waymo Open Dataset contains RGB images and lidar scans from autonomous vehicles, providing a large dataset for depth completion tasks. It includes a diverse set of scenes and annotations.
dcterms:title: Waymo Open Dataset
